meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed and unsure if I can keep up in this major
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Rebecca, a senior majoring in Politics at UC Berkeley. I’ve taken a lot of political science and international relations courses, and I’ve really enjoyed them but I’m finding it harder than expected to apply what I’ve learned in class to real-world issues. Some of my courses have focused on issues like immigration, climate change, or human rights, and I’m trying to connect what I’ve read to what I’m doing in my internships and student organizations. I feel like I’m falling behind, even though I’ve been working hard. I’d like some help understanding what I’m doing well in my major and how to stay on track, or advice on how to engage more meaningfully with the issues I’m studying.
